Title: XAML & SVG Path Compressor
Description:
Path Compressor is a simple tool for shortening XAML and SVG Vector Path Data, which helps to reduce the size of XAML and SVG documents containing many or long paths.

Feed it some XAML/SVG or a string of Path Data and it will give you back a shortened version.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Path Compressor is a simple tool for shortening XAML and SVG Vector Path Data, which helps to reduce the size of XAML and SVG documents containing many or long paths.

Feed it some XAML/SVG or a string of Path Data and it will give you back a shortened version.

Use this link to jump straight to the online version. I reserve the right to take this externally hosted version down if I need to, but it will always be here on CodePlex.
